title: s
shortDescriptionOfTheTag: The s element represents contents that are no longer accurate or no longer relevant.

usageExamples.title: Example 1
usageExamples.description: This is how you can use the s tag.
usageExamples.layoutsCode:
/s
	This text is no longer accurate.

usageExamples.title: Example 2
usageExamples.description: You can add a class to style the s tag.
usageExamples.code: <s class="strikethrough">This text is no longer relevant.</s>
usageExamples.layoutsCode:
/s .strikethrough
	This text is no longer relevant.
